divs: sighting detailssince 2012,i have notice several brightly colored round objects from the back of my deck,starting about june of 2012,most recently starting about jan 2013,the number of these objects have increased rom 1-2 to as many as 4-5.they appear out of no where below the line of star up above,it starts as a faint dim light and develops into a round pulsating ball of light of flashing red lights on the top,bright white gold light in the middle with green,blue on the bottom.with binoculars,the lights appear to spin,dip and dive and make sharp sudden turns in a holding pattern,with the binoculars,the lights seems to be still.on oct.3.2013, a large huge bright light froms in the sw sky and hoovers at about 7:45pm,the other flashing round objects seems to form at different time frames.the bright light fades in brightness at about 9:15pm,begins to pulse in the colors of red on the top,gold in the center with blue-green on the bottom,and fades to blackness by 9:20pm.the other lights begin to also fade in brightness and are all gone by 10pm.ther has been an episode in 2012,when a huge basketbakk size orange glowing light appeared thur the trees and popped otout above the the tops of the tres and hoover for a few minutes and floated across the sky toward the east and disappeared.i had no idea as to what the objects were,maybe a star,but i was able to see the object form from a small black dim spot into a round ball of a flashing colored object.i felt no fear,very interested as to what it was and to why oit appears to form at the same time same place evening.maybe a star coming out,but the surrounding stars are completely w\o any behaviours of the flashing balls of light and the stars donot flash,spin around,dip and dive across a small area of space at a very quick pace.i first began to see these object as a flash of light in the corner of my eyes.i was sooo concerned about the flashing of light in my eyes,i saw my eye care dr.who told me my eyes were ok with a good eye exam.i didn not tell him i was seeing flashing balls of light in the night sky.i lost sight of the objects because the would become smaller and dimmer in the night sky until they were no long able to be seen.
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Lee's Summit
There were no other sightings in Lee's Summit on or around October 5th 2013
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: multiple round colored flashing balls of light appears singlely out of thr darkness,flashing in the colors of re on top,gold white in the center and green blue on the bottom,as many as 5 noted seem to form around a single bright white light in the SW sky
